title: Belkin MagSafe Charger Compatible, 2-in-1 Qi2 Wireless Charging Station 15W, Convertible Wireless Charger for iPhone 16, Apple Watch, AirPods, Portable Phone Stand for Travel w/ 30W Adapter - Black
description: FAST CHARGE W/ THE LATEST Qi2 TECHNOLOGY: Conveniently place your phone on the magnetic charger to fast charge your iPhone or Qi2 compatible device up to 15W. Made with MagSafe compatibility, its Qi2 technology provides up to 2x faster wireless charging.
